entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT , Wetaskiwin
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:58 AM MST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 13 January 2023
